channel.title: Smart Women I Know
channel.description: I've spent a career getting into people's heads, as a writer, a strategist, and a natural empathisizer to, well, basically everyone and everything. If I can say I've gained one thing it's that I've met a lot of really smart, clever, ingenious women who've accomplished a lot in their careers, but usually it's through a story that's even more interesting, inspiring and compelling. These are the women I know you'll want to meet. The women who, with humor, grace and a great deal of knowing see the world and work in the world creating profound change, big and small. These are the women you wanna know. Really. Just listen.
channel.itunes:keywords: smart, women, i, know, business, female, leader,
channel.itunes:author: Ellen Barnett
channel.itunes:summary: I've spent a career getting into people's heads, as a writer, a strategist, and a natural empathisizer to, well, basically everyone and everything. If I can say I've gained one thing it's that I've met a lot of really smart, clever, ingenious women who've accomplished a lot in their careers, but usually it's through a story that's even more interesting, inspiring and compelling. These are the women I know you'll want to meet. The women who, with humor, grace and a great deal of knowing see the world and work in the world creating profound change, big and small. These are the women you wanna know. Really. Just listen.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Smart women are succeeding wildly in business. But peel back the layers and they're so much more inspiring than a title tells you. Learn how.

item.title: Gwen Foreman
item.description: Gwen Foreman is the kind of fun, interesting, honest woman that would make it as fun to work with as it would be to share a cocktail. Take a minute and listen as Gwen and I talk work, life and why a blank twitter feed will not mean the end to your career.

item.title: Jasmine Martirossian
item.description: Jasmine Martirossian is an enigma; an always fascinating mix of wisdom, humor, and grace driven by one of the most powerful minds I know.
item.itunes:summary: Jasmine Martirossian is an enigma; an always fascinating mix of wisdom, humor, and grace driven by one of the most powerful minds I know.
item.itunes:subtitle: Jasmine Martirossian is an enigma; an always fascinating mix of wisdom, humor, and grace driven by one of the most powerful minds I know.

item.title: Lonsdale Koester
item.description: Lonsdale Koester likes to ask more than answer; listen more than talk. She's now Policy Director for Gubernatorial Candidate Jay Gonzalaz. There's a delightful story behind all her accomplishment.
item.itunes:summary: Lonsdale Koester likes to ask more than answer; listen more than talk. She's now Policy Director for Gubernatorial Candidate Jay Gonzalaz. There's a delightful story behind all her accomplishment.
item.itunes:subtitle: Lonsdale Koester likes to ask more than answer; listen more than talk. She's now Policy Director for Gubernatorial Candidate Jay Gonzalaz. There's a delightful story behind all her accomplishment.

item.title: Raquel Rosenblatt
item.description: Raquel Rosenblatt is deceptive. Unassuming, deferential and kind to almost a fault, one would never suspect that under such an approachable veneer lives a powerhouse of a success story.
item.itunes:summary: Raquel Rosenblatt is deceptive. Unassuming, deferential and kind to almost a fault, one would never suspect that under such an approachable veneer lives a powerhouse of a success story.
item.itunes:subtitle: Raquel Rosenblatt is deceptive. Unassuming, deferential and kind to almost a fault, one would never suspect that under such an approachable veneer lives a powerhouse of a success story.

item.title: Erin Webster
item.description: How does a girl from a small Rhode Island town become one of the key drivers of a transformative biotech start up? Prepare to meet Erin Webster and get inspired.
item.itunes:summary: How does a girl from a small Rhode Island town become one of the key drivers of a transformative biotech start up? Prepare to meet Erin Webster and get inspired.

item.title: Friendship, Priorities and Lunch
item.description: It’s enough to balance career, home, relationships and all the attendant life stuff that eats our hours. What falls aside? The woman you were, the friends you have, the time when we’re most ourselves.

item.title: Smart Women I Know
item.description: The Smart women are succeeding wildly in business. But peel back the layers and they’re so much more inspiring than a title tells you. Learn how.
